title: Publish from Power BI Desktop for External Users
excerpt: Have you ever wanted to publish from Power BI Desktop to a different organization? External Users publishing!!! I show you how you can log in as an external user in Power BI Desktop and then publish. BANANAS!!!  Ross Couldrey LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rosscouldrey/  Distribute Power BI content
